original_text: When the trumpets made a noise, all the people gave a loud shout to attack the city. When they did this, the walls of the city fell down. All the soldiers went up into the city. They went straight in and they took the city for themselves.
korean_text: 이에 백성은 외치고 제사장들은 나팔을 불매 백성이 나팔 소리를 들을 때에 크게 소리 질러 외치니 성벽이 무너져 내린지라 백성이 각기 앞으로 나아가 그 성에 들어가서 그 성을 점령하고

sentences.original_text: When the trumpets made a noise
all the people gave a loud shout
the walls of the city fell down
All the soldiers went up into the city
and they took the city for themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 성을 자신들의 것으로 차지했다
